verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> many such <S%H7227>things<s%>: <S%H5999>miserable<s%> comforters are you <S%H5162>all<s%>.
Shall <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> have an <S%H7093>end<s%>? or what <S%H4834>emboldens<s%> you that you <S%H6030>answer<s%>?

I also could <S%H1696>speak<s%> as you <S%H3863>do<s%>: if your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3426>were<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>'s <S%H2266>place<s%>, I could heap up <S%H4405>words<s%> against <S%H5128>you<s%>, and shake my <S%H7218>head<s%> at <S%H1119>you<s%>.
But I would <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and the <S%H5205>moving<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> should assuage your <S%H2820>grief<s%>.
Though I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, my <S%H3511>grief<s%> is not <S%H2820>assuaged<s%>: and though I <S%H2308>forbear<s%>, what am I <S%H1980>eased<s%>?
But now he has made me <S%H3811>weary<s%>: you have made <S%H8074>desolate<s%> all my <S%H5712>company<s%>.

And you have filled me with <S%H7059>wrinkles<s%>, which is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H3585>me<s%>: and my leanness rising <S%H6965>up<s%> in me bears <S%H6030>witness<s%> to my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

He <S%H2963>tears<s%> me in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, who <S%H7852>hates<s%> <S%H2786>me<s%>: he gnashes upon me with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>; my <S%H6862>enemy<s%> <S%H3913>sharpens<s%> his eyes upon <S%H5869>me<s%>.

They have <S%H6473>gaped<s%> upon me with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; they have <S%H5221>struck<s%> me upon the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> <S%H2781>reproachfully<s%>; they have <S%H4390>gathered<s%> themselves together against <S%H3162>me<s%>.
<S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H5462>delivered<s%> me to the <S%H5760>ungodly<s%>, and turned me <S%H3399>over<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

I was at <S%H7961>ease<s%>, but he has broken me <S%H6565>asunder<s%>: he has also <S%H270>taken<s%> me by my <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and shaken me to <S%H6327>pieces<s%>, and set me <S%H6965>up<s%> for his <S%H4307>mark<s%>.

His <S%H7228>archers<s%> compass me round <S%H5437>about<s%>, he <S%H6398>cleaves<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> <S%H6398>asunder<s%>, and does not <S%H2550>spare<s%>; he pours <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H4845>gall<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
He <S%H6555>breaks<s%> me with <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%>, he <S%H7323>runs<s%> upon me like a <S%H1368>giant<s%>.
I have <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon my <S%H1539>skin<s%>, and <S%H5953>defiled<s%> my <S%H7161>horn<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
My <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H2560>foul<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and on my <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> is the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>;
Not for any <S%H2555>injustice<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%>: also my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is <S%H2134>pure<s%>.
O <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H3680>cover<s%> not you my <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and let my <S%H2201>cry<s%> have no <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Also <S%H5707>now<s%>, behold, my witness is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and my <S%H7717>record<s%> is on <S%H4791>high<s%>.
My <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H3887>scorn<s%> <S%H5869>me<s%>: but my eye pours <S%H1811>out<s%> tears unto <S%H433>God<s%>.
O that one might <S%H3198>plead<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> with <S%H433>God<s%>, as a <S%H120>man<s%> pleads for his <S%H1121>neighbor<s%>!
When a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H857>come<s%>, then I shall <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> from where I shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>.
